That's great for you!

That's easy, huh? That shit is so easy!
 A FRANCE FOR ALL REAL SOLUTIONS COME FROM BELOW

Honey!

Hm…

Mali!

Tu m'as fait peur. Stop !

 You scared me. Stop it.

Stéphane Blé, bởi vì…

all her children,

Whoo!

I'm worried about your cousin. You know what he's saying out there?
 -"Liberty, equality…"

 Có vụ gì vậy?
